name: Trello Bright
description:
A brighter style for trello for boards with a lot of cards.
 Many things have been optimized to have much better trello experience like brighter design, no backgrounds on lists, browser scrolling (no more in-list scrolling), smaller labels and user icons.
additional_info:
Version 0.3 – minimal adjustments
Version 0.2 – fixed font issue
Version 0.1 – Initial release
